# row

**Instance Property**

An index number identifying a row in a section of a table view.

## Declaration

```swift
var row: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The section the row is in is identified by the value of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexPath/section].

## Using Special Node Names

- **init(forRow:inSection:)**: Initializes an index path with the indexes of a specific row and section in a table view.
- **init(forItem:inSection:)**: Initializes an index path with the indexes of a specific item and section in a collection view.
- **section**: An index number identifying a section in a table view or collection view.
- **item**: An index number identifying an item in a section of a collection view.
